name: Destroy all Meatbags
description:
You play as a sentient  AI in a war bots chasis who is bent on saving his fellow robots and killing their masters, the goal is to finish the level while freeing as many bot as you can and destroying all humans in your path.

(W) (S) - move forward and back

(A) (D)- rotate left and right

MOUSE- aim

L click - fire guns

(E) to interact with other robots

SPACE- to deploy shield

SHIFT- sprint mode

This game is in the very early stages of development. There is only 1 level so far, no sound, simple sprites, and corny animations. I started this project on 3/1/22 and posted on 3/12/22. I will be continuing to work on it for now.  I posted this mainly so a few people i know can see what ive been up too but anyone is welcome to take a look

windows only

Made with Game maker 2

assets used:

craftpix-zombie-tds-2d-game-kitassets - sprites

kenny's top down shooter - sprites

pixelated pope's collision script
